pension.label: Are you getting regular payments from a pension or annuity?
pension.p: You do not need to tell us about single lump sum pension payments.
pension.li5: pension from a self-employed pension scheme
pension.annuity: An annuity is an insurance product that allows you to swap your pension savings for a guaranteed regular income that will last for the rest of your life.

errors.required: Select yes if you're getting regular payments from a pension or annuity

other.label: Are you getting any other pensions or annuities?

errors.required: Select yes if you're getting any other pensions or annuities
